DOC.brief_summary: Based on fundamental study （in Vitro and in Vivo, Pro. Jianjian Li）， Her2 expression would be changed from negative to positive by cancer irradiation with liner-accelerator at dose 6GY or up. The propose of this study is to reveal the irradiation result on Her2 expression in human breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Radiotherapy Alternates Human Epidermal Growth Factor 2 (Her2) Expression in Human Breast Cancer
